definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: A minute inspection of the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 對場地進行詳細的檢查。

sentences.english: The rolling plains and the wild flowers, the boxing ring and a few old scores to settle.
sentences.chinese: 起伏的平原和野花，拳賽場地和要解決的舊帳。

sentences.english: I apologize for everyone having to cram in such a small space.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉讓大家擠在這麼小的場地。

sentences.english: There is only one practicing spot here in Liuyang. I have been there for only three times.
sentences.chinese: 在瀏陽只有一個高爾夫場地，我去過三次。

sentences.english: Steel chisel grassland, pitch surface ground or other soft ground.
sentences.chinese: 使用鋼釺在草地，瀝青地或其它鬆軟場地上固定篷房。

sentences.english: Joint venture must implement the principle of economizing on land in their use of sites.
sentences.chinese: 合營企業使用場地，必須貫徹執行節約用地原則。

sentences.english: One of the Croft movie’s filming locations was Cambodia.
sentences.chinese: 《古墓麗影》的拍攝場地之一是柬埔寨。

sentences.english: It's quite trendy now. It's where the Olympic Games is going to happen,
sentences.chinese: 那裏現在相當時髦了。那是奧運會將要舉辦的場地，

sentences.english: It is the best to observe this eclipse at locations not obscured to the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 最佳觀測地點爲西南面沒有阻擋的場地。

sentences.english: The match have to is abandoned because the pitch is waterlogged.
sentences.chinese: 那場比賽因場地汪水只好取消。

sentences.english: Exhibition floors were chock-a-block with racing and sports cars.
sentences.chinese: 上演場地上讓比賽車塞得滿滿的。

sentences.english: These agents must secure roads and rooftops4 around the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 這些探員必須戒護場地的外圍道路及屋頂。

sentences.english: It now plans to build more pitches for students to play on.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們正在籌劃建立更多的場地供學生們踢球。

sentences.english: The team did some abdominals on the indoor pitch.
sentences.chinese: 球隊在室內場地進行了一些腰腹訓練。

sentences.english: Is engaged in the production development sports location product specially the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 是專門從事生產開發體育場地產品的企業。

sentences.english: The first training match was on a reduced pitch and ball possession work concluded this phase.
sentences.chinese: 第一場練習賽在小場地裏進行，結束後是帶球訓練。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc
